title: Veggie puttanesca
description: This budget vegetarian take on classic Italian puttanesca sauce is a store-cupboard saviour.If you're making this recipe to serve two, cook half the pasta and freeze half the cooked sauce.Each serving provides 504kcal, 12g protein, 65g carbohydrate (of which 12g sugars), 17g fat (of which 2.5g saturates), 7g fibre and	1.4g salt.
ingredients: 200g/7oz frozen chopped onions (or 2 medium onions, roughly chopped)
125g/4½oz drained, pitted black olives, cut in half
150ml/5fl oz red wine or vegetable stock
handful fresh flatleaf parsley leaves, roughly chopped (optional)
